shopItem.name: The Sopranos
shopItem.description: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

shopItem.name: Game of Thrones
shopItem.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

shopItem.name: The Wire
shopItem.description: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

shopItem.name: Dexter
shopItem.description: By day, mild-mannered Dexter is a blood-spatter analyst for the Miami police. But at night, he is a serial killer who only targets other murderers.

shopItem.name: Breaking Bad
shopItem.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

shopItem.name: The Walking Dead
shopItem.description: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins, and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.

shopItem.name: Boardwalk Empire
shopItem.description: An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era.

shopItem.name: Rome
shopItem.description: A down-to-earth account of the lives of both illustrious and ordinary Romans set in the last days of the Roman Republic.

shopItem.name: Mad Men
shopItem.description: A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.

shopItem.name: Sons of Anarchy
shopItem.description: A biker struggles to balance being a father and being involved in an outlaw motorcycle club.

shopItem.name: The West Wing
shopItem.description: Inside the lives of staffers in the West Wing of the White House.

shopItem.name: Weeds
shopItem.description: When a suburban mother turns to dealing marijuana in order to maintain her privileged lifestyle after her husband dies, she finds out just how addicted her entire neighborhood already is.

shopItem.name: Lost
shopItem.description: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.

shopItem.name: Suits
shopItem.description: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, Mike Ross, a brilliant college dropout, finds himself a job working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.

shopItem.name: Homeland
shopItem.description: A bipolar CIA operative becomes convinced a prisoner of war has been turned by al-Qaeda and is planning to carry out a terrorist attack on American soil.

shopItem.name: Spartacus: Blood and Sand
shopItem.description: The life of Spartacus, the gladiator who lead a rebellion against the Romans. From his time as an ally of the Romans, to his betrayal and becoming a gladiator, to the rebellion he leads and its ultimate outcome.

shopItem.name: The Simpsons
shopItem.description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

shopItem.name: Family Guy
shopItem.description: In a wacky Rhode Island town, a dysfunctional family strive to cope with everyday life as they are thrown from one crazy scenario to another.

shopItem.name: How I Met Your Mother
shopItem.description: A father recounts to his children, through a series of flashbacks, the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

shopItem.name: Oz
shopItem.description: A series chronicling the daily activities of an unusual prison facility and its criminal inhabitants.

shopItem.name: Firefly
shopItem.description: Five hundred years in the future, a renegade crew aboard a small spacecraft tries to survive as they travel the unknown parts of the galaxy and evade warring factions as well as authority agents out to get them.

shopItem.name: Futurama
shopItem.description: Philip J. Fry, a pizza delivery boy, is accidentally frozen in 1999 and thawed out on New Year's Eve 2999.

shopItem.name: South Park
shopItem.description: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

shopItem.name: Entourage
shopItem.description: Film star Vince Chase navigates the vapid terrain of Los Angeles with a close circle of friends and his trusty agent.

shopItem.name: Californication
shopItem.description: A writer tries to juggle his career, his relationship with his daughter and his ex-girlfriend, as well as his appetite for beautiful women.

shopItem.name: Seinfeld
shopItem.description: The continuing misadventures of neurotic New York City stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld and his equally neurotic New York City friends.

shopItem.name: Carniv√†le
shopItem.description: During the Great Depression, an Oklahoma farm boy and a charismatic minister learn that they are key players in a proxy war being fought between Heaven and Hell.

shopItem.name: Jericho
shopItem.description: A small town in Kansas is literally left in the dark after seeing a mushroom cloud over near-by Denver, Colorado. The townspeople struggle to find answers about the blast and solutions on how to survive.

shopItem.name: Flashforward
shopItem.description: A special task force in the FBI investigates after every person on Earth simultaneously blacks out and awakens with a short vision of their future.

shopItem.name: True Blood
shopItem.description: Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.

shopItem.name: The Vampire Diaries
shopItem.description: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

shopItem.name: Arrested Development
shopItem.description: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.

shopItem.name: Deadwood
shopItem.description: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

shopItem.name: Six Feet Under
shopItem.description: A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.

shopItem.name: Boss
shopItem.description: Mayor Tom Kane, diagnosed with a dementia disorder, struggles to keep his grip on power in Chicago.

shopItem.name: Hell on Wheels
shopItem.description: The Civil War is past, but former Confederate soldier Cullen Bohannon can't put it behind him. Fresh are the memories of the death of his wife, killed at the hands of the Union soldiers, an act that sets him on a course of revenge.

shopItem.name: The Shield
shopItem.description: Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.

shopItem.name: Blue Bloods
shopItem.description: Revolves around a family of New York cops.

shopItem.name: Misfits
shopItem.description: A group of young offenders doing community service get struck by lightning during a storm, and begin to develop superpowers.

shopItem.name: Shameless
shopItem.description: A scrappy, fiercely loyal Chicago family makes no apologies.

shopItem.name: The Big Bang Theory
shopItem.description: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

shopItem.name: Rescue Me
shopItem.description: Tommy Gavin deals with the fears of his job as a firefighter and seeing his ex-wife dating other men.

shopItem.name: The Borgias
shopItem.description: In the fifteenth century, Pope Alexander VI tries to control all power in Italy with the help of his several sons, through murder, intrigue, war, and marriage alliances.

shopItem.name: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
shopItem.description: Five friends with big egos and slightly arrogant attitudes are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.

shopItem.name: The X Files
shopItem.description: Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.

shopItem.name: Curb Your Enthusiasm
shopItem.description: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

shopItem.name: Episodes
shopItem.description: A couple of TV producers move to Hollywood to export their most popular series and find it is not what they expected.

shopItem.name: American Horror Story
shopItem.description: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, and a slasher summer camp.

shopItem.name: House of Lies
shopItem.description: A subversive, scathing look at a self-loathing management consultant from a top-tier firm. Marty, a highly successful, cutthroat consultant is never above using any means (or anyone) necessary to get his clients the information they want.

shopItem.name: Luther
shopItem.description: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

shopItem.name: Justified
shopItem.description: U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens's reassigned from Miami to his childhood home in the poor, rural coal mining towns in eastern Kentucky.
Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.

shopItem.name: Sherlock
shopItem.description: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

shopItem.name: The Killing
shopItem.description: A police investigation, the saga of a grieving family, and a Seattle mayoral campaign all interlock after the body of 17-year-old Rosie Larsen is found in the trunk of a submerged car.

shopItem.name: Scrubs
shopItem.description: In the unreal world of Sacred Heart Hospital, intern John 'J.D.' Dorian learns the ways of medicine, friendship, and life.

shopItem.name: House M.D.
shopItem.description: An antisocial maverick doctor who specializes in diagnostic medicine does whatever it takes to solve puzzling cases that come his way using his crack team of doctors and his wits.

shopItem.name: Grey's Anatomy
shopItem.description: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

shopItem.name: ER
shopItem.description: The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.

shopItem.name: Friends
shopItem.description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

shopItem.name: Fringe
shopItem.description: An F.B.I. agent is forced to work with an institutionalized scientist and his son in order to rationalize a brewing storm of unexplained phenomena.

shopItem.name: Supernatural
shopItem.description: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

shopItem.name: Twin Peaks
shopItem.description: An idiosyncratic FBI agent investigates the murder of a young woman in the even more idiosyncratic town of Twin Peaks.

shopItem.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
shopItem.description: A young woman, destined to slay vampires, demons and other infernal creatures, deals with her life fighting evil, with the help of her friends.

shopItem.name: Angel
shopItem.description: The vampire Angel, cursed with a soul, moves to Los Angeles and aids people with supernatural-related problems while questing for his own redemption.

shopItem.name: Monk
shopItem.description: Adrian Monk is a brilliant San Francisco detective, whose obsessive compulsive disorder just happens to get in the way.

shopItem.name: Veronica Mars
shopItem.description: After her best friend is murdered, and her father is removed as county Sheriff, Veronica Mars dedicates her life to cracking the toughest mysteries in the affluent town of Neptune.

shopItem.name: Friday Night Lights
shopItem.description: A drama that follows the lives of the Dillon Panthers, one of the nation's best high school football teams, and their head coach Eric Taylor.

shopItem.name: Doctor Who
shopItem.description: The further adventures in time and space of the alien adventurer known as the Doctor and their companions from planet Earth.

shopItem.name: Battlestar Galactica
shopItem.description: When an old enemy, the Cylons, resurface and obliterate the 12 colonies, the crew of the aged Galactica protect a small civilian fleet - the last of humanity - as they journey toward the fabled 13th colony, Earth.

shopItem.name: Party Down
shopItem.description: A group of actors move to Los Angeles to make it big, but end up working as caterers.

shopItem.name: Community
shopItem.description: A suspended lawyer is forced to enroll in a community college with an eclectic staff and student body.

shopItem.name: Parks and Recreation
shopItem.description: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

shopItem.name: Louie
shopItem.description: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

shopItem.name: Archer
shopItem.description: Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and relationships between secret agents and drones.

shopItem.name: Happy Endings
shopItem.description: This Chicago-set sitcom follows the intertwined lives of six young urbanites trying to learn the ropes of adulthood. Through breakups and whatever other curve-balls life throws them, the pals stick together.

shopItem.name: Nip/Tuck
shopItem.description: The dark and twisted trials of two plastic surgeons.

shopItem.name: Malcolm in the Middle
shopItem.description: A gifted young teen tries to survive life with his dimwitted, dysfunctional family.

shopItem.name: Prison Break
shopItem.description: Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man is sent to death row and his only hope is his brother, who makes it his mission to deliberately get himself sent to the same prison in order to break the both of them out, from the inside.

shopItem.name: The Newsroom
shopItem.description: A newsroom undergoes some changes in its workings and morals as a new team is brought in, bringing unexpected results for its existing news anchor.

shopItem.name: Modern Family
shopItem.description: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

shopItem.name: Numb3rs
shopItem.description: Working for the F.B.I., a mathematician uses equations to help solve various crimes.

shopItem.name: The Mentalist
shopItem.description: A famous 'psychic' outs himself as a fake, and starts working as a consultant for the California Bureau of Investigation so he can find 'Red John', the madman who killed his wife and daughter.

shopItem.name: The Good Wife
shopItem.description: Alicia has been a good wife to her husband, a former state's attorney. After a very humiliating sex and corruption scandal, he is behind bars. She must now provide for her family and returns to work as a litigator in a law firm.

shopItem.name: Burn Notice
shopItem.description: A spy recently disavowed by the U.S. government uses his special ops training to help others in trouble.

shopItem.name: White Collar
shopItem.description: A white collar criminal agrees to help the FBI catch other white collar criminals using his expertise as an art and securities thief, counterfeiter, and conman.

shopItem.name: Dallas
shopItem.description: The next generation of the Ewing family, cousins John Ross Ewing and Christopher Ewing, clash over the family's oil business and vast fortune.

shopItem.name: Freaks and Geeks
shopItem.description: A high school mathlete starts hanging out with a group of burnouts while her younger brother navigates his freshman year.

shopItem.name: The League
shopItem.description: An ensemble comedy that follows a group of old friends in a fantasy football league who care deeply about one another -- so deeply that they use every opportunity to make each other's lives miserable.

shopItem.name: Heroes
shopItem.description: Common people discover that they have super powers. Their lives intertwine as a devastating event must be prevented.

shopItem.name: Desperate Housewives
shopItem.description: Secrets and truths unfold through the lives of female friends in one suburban neighborhood, after the mysterious suicide of a neighbor.

shopItem.name: Being Human
shopItem.description: A werewolf, a vampire and a ghost try to live together and get along.

shopItem.name: NCIS: Los Angeles
shopItem.description: The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.

shopItem.name: CSI: Miami
shopItem.description: The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.

shopItem.name: Psych
shopItem.description: A novice sleuth is hired by the police after he cons them into thinking he has psychic powers which help solve crimes. With the assistance of his reluctant best friend, the duo take on a series of complicated cases.

shopItem.name: The Following
shopItem.description: A brilliant and charismatic, yet psychotic serial killer communicates with other active serial killers and activates a cult of believers following his every command.

shopItem.name: Roswell
shopItem.description: The lives of three young alien/human hybrids with extraordinary gifts in Roswell.

shopItem.name: M*A*S*H
shopItem.description: The staff of an Army hospital in the Korean War find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.

shopItem.name: Criminal Minds
shopItem.description: The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again.

shopItem.name: The Office
shopItem.description: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

shopItem.name: Warehouse 13
shopItem.description: Pete and Myka, U.S Secret Service agents, are deployed in South Dakota's Warehouse 13 with a new assignment from an authority above and outside the government.
